books.synopsis: When The Shadow Of Death Falls On Our Faces, Life Wants To Give Us A Chance To Live Insistently, It Warns Us In Many Ways And It Is Testing Again And Again. The Anonymous Narrator Of Sürüklenme Is A Supporter Of A Seemingly Non-governmental Organization. The Return Of A Voyage Is Dragged Under The Influence Of An Uncanny Person He First Encountered On The Plane, Then A Charismatic Taxi Driver Resembling A Prophet, Even The Sky And Indescribable Powers On Earth. To Provide Resources To Organizations From Large Companies That Overrun The Resorts In Turkey, Russia And England, Many Who Travel From Germany And Greece, The Narrator, On The One Hand, Enters Into A Profound Reckoning With The Leaders. On The Other Hand, He Tries To Treat The Sense Of Self-esteem That Is Unique To Our Time, To Give Meaning To His Own Life By Defending Orphans, Disillusioned And Disobedient Young People, And To Treat The Hunger Of Love. Latife Tekin.
